metadata.title: CVE-2013-7416 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: canto_curses/guibase.py in Canto Curses before 0.9.0 allows remote feedservers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in a URL ina feed.

criterions.comment: canto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
